source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_00<tab>T'laqa Tia will stop at nothing to complete his research.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_00<tab>選者殿のチャ・ラカ・ティアは、データ採集が一気に進むことを期待しているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_01<tab>Your discussion with T'laqa Tia is suddenly interrupted by a flustered research assistant, who reports that a whale has somehow wandered its way into Scholar's Harbor. The harbormaster has requested T'laqa Tia's immediate presence, and the professor, in turn, asks for yours.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_01<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアは迷い込んだというクジラを見に向かった。オールド・シャーレアンの知神の港の「チャ・ラカ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the harbor and identifying the whale, T'laqa Tia decides to bring the confused creature in for a thorough examination. As he and his team may be tending to the whale for some time, the professor asks that you await him back at Searchers' Meet.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_02<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアはクジラを保護するようだ。選者殿の「指定地点」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_03<tab>T'laqa Tia does not keep you waiting long, but it seems his analysis of the wayward whale has produced more questions than answers. It is at this point that Kytte arrives to report a similar incident, wherein a veritable legion of fish has washed ashore in Yedlihmad not far from the experimental aetheryte. The coincidence is too great to ignore. Plucking up his courage, T'laqa Tia volunteers himself to join you in Yedlihmad, where you might begin investigating this worrisome occurrence.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_03<tab>クジラの保護を終えたチャ・ラカ・ティアと話した。サベネア島のイェドリマンにいる「チャ・ラカ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_04<tab>You arrive in Yedlihmad to find T'laqa Tia suffering from a ghastly case of aether sickness. As he is in no state to investigate much of anything for the moment, it falls to you to gather information on the wayward sea life.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_04<tab>サベネア島のチャ・ラカ・ティアはエーテル酔いが酷いようだ。彼に代わりイェドリマンで、打ち上げられた魚についての情報を集めよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_05<tab>Your inquiries into the recent shoreline incident have produced some interesting responses. T'laqa Tia will wish to hear what you have learned.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_05<tab>打ち上げられた魚についての情報を集めた。イェドリマンの「チャ・ラカ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_06<tab>You share your findings with T'laqa Tia, and he believes the fish which were carried upstream might provide some valuable data. According to the professor, baiting your hook with leeches should allow you to catch an Alnairan salmon somewhere along Ksiroda.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_06<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアは、遡上した川の魚からデータが取れそうだという。「<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>」を、イェドリマンの「チャ・ラカ・ティア」へ納品しよう。「<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>」はサベネア島のクシールローダ川で「ウマビル」などの釣り餌で釣りあげることができる。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_07<tab>You deliver the salmon to an appreciative─and apologetic─T'laqa Tia. With fish sample in hand, the yet-shaky scholar makes preparations to return to Searchers' Meet.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_07<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアに「<var 28 ((ItemMP)) F28C0901 /var>」を渡した。オールド・シャーレアンの選者殿で、データを分析する「チャ・ラカ・ティア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_08<tab>You return to find T'laqa Tia has already completed his analysis of the salmon. As suspected, it contained the same levels of aether as the wayward whale, and, after a brief discussion, you agree that the tidal bore─and thus some property of the moon─is likely the culprit of this strange behavior. T'laqa Tia theorizes that Zodiark's demise and the sudden release of massive amounts of aether could account for the discrepancies, but obtaining an uncontaminated species for comparison is an endeavor that will require more careful consideration...
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_08<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアと話した。手助けできる新たな情報が手に入り次第、ふたたびチャ・ラカ・ティアに声をかけよう。

target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_00<tab>Speak with T'laqa Tia.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_00<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_01<tab>Wait for T'laqa Tia at the designated location.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_01<tab>指定地点で待機する

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_02<tab>Speak with T'laqa Tia in Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_02<tab>イェドリマンのチャ・ラカ・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_03<tab>Gather information on the wayward sea life.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_03<tab>打ち上がった魚の情報を集める

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_04<tab>Speak with T'laqa Tia.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_04<tab>チャ・ラカ・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch an Alnairan salmon in Ksiroda.)) ((Deliver the Alnairan salmon to T'laqa Tia.)) /var>
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((クシールローダ川で<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>を釣る)) ((イェドリマンのチャ・ラカ・ティアに<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_06<tab>Speak with T'laqa Tia at Searchers' Meet.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TODO_06<tab>選者殿のチャ・ラカ・ティアと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>In order to progress further in the quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “At World's End.”
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>本クエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：暁月のフィナーレ」の
「この世界の終末」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_010<tab>Thanks to your most selfless contributions, I draw closer and closer to proving my hypothesis correct. Other gleaners have also been helping me by continuing to find specimens for me in calmer waters.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_010<tab>お前の協力のおかげで、仮説の実証が近づいてきたぜ！
安全な海域には、ほかのグリーナーを動員することで、
各地のデータも集まりつつあるんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_010<tab>But I would gather data from further and further afield. Which is, of course, where you come in...
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_010<tab>さて、それじゃあ肝心のお前に頼みたいことなんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_011<tab>Professor!
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_011<tab>チャ・ラカさん！！！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_012<tab>Aubracie. It's not like you to get so excited. Whatever is the matter?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_012<tab>ん……？
おお、どうした？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_013<tab>Ah, but I haven't introduced you two yet, have I? This is Aubracie, one of my new research assistants. She's been a great help in analyzing all the data we've collected.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_013<tab>そういや、まだお前に紹介してなかったな。
研究を手伝ってくれている、うちの学生のオブラシーだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_014<tab>I appreciate the vote of confidence, but this is no time for pleasantries! A whale has somehow wandered its way into Scholar's Harbor!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_014<tab>いまは、ゆっくりと挨拶している場合じゃありませんよ……！
知神の港に、クジラが迷い込んできたんです！
しかも衰弱している様子で……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_015<tab>The harbormaster has requested that you come and assess the situation with all haste!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_015<tab>港湾職員から水脈や水棲生物に詳しい、
チャ・ラカさんに、急いで来てほしいって要請が！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_016<tab>Oh dear! I suppose we'd best be in a hurry, then.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_016<tab>わ、わかった！
すぐ向かうよ……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_017<tab>My apologies, but it seems our work will have to wait until later. In the meanwhile, would you accompany me to the harbor? Your insight into the situation could prove most valuable.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_017<tab>こりゃ、依頼の話は後回しだな。
一緒に様子を見に行こうぜ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_019<tab>I believe it was somewhere around here... Look, everyone must be so concerned. It's not every day that a massive whale finds its way into the harbor...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_019<tab>みんな集まっているし、このあたりだと思うんですが……。
クジラが迷い込むなんて、よっぽどの事件ですよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_020<tab>Hmm, that's a breed that calls the northern seas home. It's not especially rare to see them off the coast, but I've never heard of one coming so close to land as this.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_020<tab>あれは北洋を回遊している種類だな……。
近海で見かけるのは珍しくないけど、
陸に近づくことは、まずないはずだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_021<tab>It's most strange. It doesn't appear to be wounded, nor have there been any notable storms of late. Whatever might have caused it to veer so far off its normal course?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_021<tab>ここから観察できる範囲では、外傷は見受けられません。
最近は海が荒れたって話も聞かないし、いったいどうして……？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_022<tab>What indeed... At any rate, we need to move it to one of our facilities and ensure it's kept safe while we tend to its wounds it may have and study it more. I suppose we should check its aether levels as well. Ready a team for me, Aubracie.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_022<tab>ともかく、大学の施設で保護して、治療と分析だ。
生体エーテルの測定も行わなきゃならないか……
人手の手配を頼めるか？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_023<tab>Of course, Professor!
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_023<tab>はい、もちろんです！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_024<tab>This may be quite the undertaking. My apologies, but our project will have to wait a while longer. Let us reconvene back at Searchers' Meet and discuss the matter further.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_024<tab>これは大掛かりな仕事になりそうだな……。
悪い、しばらく依頼どころじゃなくなるかもだ。
選者殿に戻って、待っていてくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_030<tab>Oh, hello there. I'm so very sorry for keeping you waiting. We just finished tending to the creature's ailments and doing some preliminary analysis.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_030<tab>待たせたな……。
クジラの応急手当と、簡易的な分析が済んだところだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_031<tab>As we suspected, the whale hadn't sustained any major injuries. However, it <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> seem to be suffering from severe aether sickness and is highly disoriented as a result. Needless to say, I can sympathize.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_031<tab>当初の見立てどおり、大きな外傷はありませんでした。
しかし、エーテル酔いに似た症状で、意識が混濁している様子……
生体エーテルの値にも乱れが見られました。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_032<tab>The creature's aether levels were also cause for concern, which would explain why it wound up somewhere so far from its usual habitat. That said, we're still none the wiser as to <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> caused all of this.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_032<tab>ああ、港に迷い込んだのも、そのせいだろうな。
しかし、いったい何に影響を受けたのか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_033<tab>How goes it, T'laqa? Oh, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What a pleasant surprise. I've heard all about your predicament with the wayward whale.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_033<tab>やぁ、チャ・ラカ。
それに<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も。
クジラの話は聞いたよ……大変なことになってるみたいだね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_034<tab>Master Kytte! To what do I owe the pleasure?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_034<tab>キット！　どうしてここに？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_035<tab>I was simply hoping to pick your brains about something that I imagine is related to your line of work.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_035<tab>同じエーテル学系の研究者として、少し気になることがあってね。
水脈関係のことじゃないかって、君に相談に来たんだよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_036<tab>Around the same time your larger-than-life friend wandered into the harbor, a veritable legion of fish washed ashore in Yedlihmad, near the experimental aetheryte.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_036<tab>ちょうどクジラが迷いこんできたのと同じ頃！
新型エーテライトを置いている、サベネア島のイェドリマンから、
大量の魚が浜に打ち上がるという事件があったと、報告がきたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_037<tab>That sounds too similar to be mere coincidence. Curious behavior by aquatic life has been known to portend natural disasters. Yes, this strikes me as very much related to my studies.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_037<tab>なるほど、離れた場所で同時に起きた、ふたつの事件か……。
海洋生物の異常行動は、災害の前触れであることもあり得るし、
確かに俺の研究とも関連があるかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_038<tab>That said, nothing I have gleaned thus far has suggested that aether currents can change so drastically as to inflict nearby creatures with aether sickness...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_038<tab>でも、生物に強いエーテル酔いを与えるほどの水脈の乱れかぁ……。
俺の「水脈潮汐説」でも、それほどの変動は予測できちゃいない。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_039<tab>All I have observed suggests that the currents of the planet follow a simple and regular rhythm, not unlike the tides. Indeed, the entirety of my research up until now has been focused on proving this point.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_039<tab>あくまで水脈は、一定のリズムで世界を巡っているはず。
その考えを証明するために、今までデータ分析を重ねてきたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_040<tab>If there has been a sudden disturbance in the underwater aether currents, then it will take some time to determine the cause. I also need to attend to the whale. Oh, when will I have time to return to my thesis...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_040<tab>突発的な水脈の乱れが事実だとしたら、
その原因を特定するまで、俺の理論の証明は遠のいちまう。
クジラたちの件の究明は元より、な……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_041<tab>As for the whale, the Studium has already announced that it will be dispatching a vessel to research the aether currents in the seas near Sharlayan. It won't benefit any of us if such incidents continue to occur, after all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_041<tab>クジラの件については、近海の水脈に異変がないかどうか、
魔法大学がシャーレアン沖に、調査船を出すことになっています。
同じことが続けば、都市にとっても問題ですからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_042<tab>If we wish to investigate the link between the two events, as Master Kytte suggested, then perhaps we should pay visit to Thavnair.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_042<tab>そしてキットさんが伝えてくれたように、2件の関連を探るなら、
サベネア島側も調査しなければというところでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_043<tab>An astute suggestion. You could recruit the help of one of our colleagues over there, or... Wait a minute. I believe you have the perfect <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the job right here!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_043<tab>そうなるね、両方を調べなくちゃ始まらないよ。
現地のシャーレアンの協力者に頼んでみるか、それとも……
あっ、ちょうど事情に通じた適任者がいるんじゃない？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A1_000_001<tab>Sure, I'll go to Thavnair.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A1_000_001<tab>もちろん、自分がサベネア島に向かおう

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A1_000_002<tab>If you insist...
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A1_000_002<tab>やっぱり自分の出番か……

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_045<tab>As generous and dependable as ever! Yes, I knew you'd be up to the task.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_045<tab>ふふん、頼もしいねー！
さすが、うちの被検体に志願した度胸の持ち主だよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_046<tab>I would accompany <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_046<tab>……俺も行かせてくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_047<tab>You would? When was the last time you even ventured outside the Studium's grounds?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_047<tab>おお？
大学に引き篭もってばかりの君が、サベネア島に行くの？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_048<tab>Th-That's not important! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has risked life and limb to help me with my research! I can't just keep leaving all the hard work to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_048<tab>こいつが各地を飛び回ってくれたことで、
俺の研究は進展を見せてきたんだ。
なら俺も、肝心なときに待ってるだけじゃいられない！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_049<tab>But Professor, going to Thavnair means you would have to travel via the aetheryte! Or by ship─not that you'd handle that any better...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_049<tab>チャ・ラカさん、サベネア島なんて行ったことないでしょう……！？
行くとなれば、新型エーテライトでってなるんでしょうけど、
エーテル酔いが酷いんだから、絶対やめておいたほうが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_050<tab>You don't have to tell me that. Still, time is of the essence. Besides, I'll never be truly respected as a researcher if I don't go out and get my hands dirty from time to time.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_050<tab>今回の調査は、すぐに行わなくちゃ意味がない！
それに……俺がエーテル学の研究者として生きていく以上、
フィールドワークは、避けて通れない道だからな。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_051<tab>I have let my fears rule me for far too long. Today is the day I conquer them!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_051<tab>恐怖が先立って、これまで避けてきたけど……
今が、そのときだって感じるんだ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_052<tab>Well, it's clear you're not going to change your mind.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_KYTTE_000_052<tab>……こりゃ、意志は固そうだね！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_053<tab>At least try not to cause <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> much trouble.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_053<tab>もう……知りませんからね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに、
迷惑がかからないようにしてくださいよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_054<tab>Now that you mention it, I hadn't consulted you on the matter. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you mind if I join you this time?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_054<tab>あっ！　そ、それはそうだな……
なぁ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
俺も一緒に行って、構わないか……？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_055<tab>Fantastic! In that case, I shall see you in Yedlihmad!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_055<tab>よしっ……！！
それじゃあ、イェドリマンで集合だ！
俺とお前で、事件の真相を探りにいこう！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_056<tab>The professor was saying he would go on ahead to Yedlihmad and wait for you by the experimental aetheryte. I do hope he isn't too much of a nuisance for you with his aether sickness...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_056<tab>チャ・ラカさんは、イェドリマンまで、
キットさんのところから新型エーテライトを使うみたいですね。
意気込んでましたけど、本当に大丈夫かな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_100_061<tab>I found this fellow rolling about in his own vomit a short while ago. Not a pretty sight, I can assure you. I'm not sure I've ever seen someone suffer from such severe aether sickness...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_100_061<tab>こいつがエーテル酔いで転がってるのを見つけてな……。
少し様子を見てやってたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_060<tab>Urk... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...? Is that you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_060<tab>……ぁ…………
その声……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>か……？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_061<tab>Ah, you know this fellow? The poor man was so ill I thought he might die. I'd not have believed anyone could suffer from such severe aether sickness if I hadn't seen it myself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_061<tab>たまたま通りがかったから看てやってたんだが、
これほど酷いエーテル酔いを起こす奴は、珍しいぞ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_062<tab>Be glad you weren't here to see me immediately after I arrived. It was even...less pretty a sight than what you witnessed at the aetheryte plaza back in Sharlayan.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_062<tab>ううぅ……テレポ直後はかなりやばかった……。
今回は、今までで一番すごい景色が見えたなぁ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_200_062<tab>And don't even get me started on the most ghastly visions I saw...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_200_062<tab>やっぱり、どこまでも続く花畑が見えてさ……
愉快な仲間との楽しい時間が、
ずーっと続いてるみたいだったんだ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_300_062<tab>Countless replicas of myself, dancing and singing and spinning, spinning, spinning... Oh, the spinning! Please, make it stop! Urk...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_300_062<tab>あははっ、みんなで歌って踊って、楽しかったなぁ！
俺と、俺が、おれがい～っぱいいて、みんなで、
うぇッおえっ…………

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_400_062<tab>I'd suggest you lie down for a while still, friend. It wasn't so long ago that you were convulsing on the ground, spitting up some ghastly bile.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_400_062<tab>おいおい、無理して動くなよ……。
さっきまでこの道端で、
魚みたいに痙攣を起こしてたじゃないか。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_500_062<tab>You are right, my friend. My apologies for making you worry so.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_500_062<tab>本当にありがとうございます…………
まだ、幻覚が続いてるみたいで……うぅ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_062<tab>I'm truly sorry about this, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Might you be so kind as to ask around while I rest here a bit more?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_062<tab>す、すまないけど……もう少し休むよ……。
例の、打ち上げられた魚……聞き込み、頼……む……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_063<tab>My apologies. I simply don't have the physical fortitude to do much of anything right now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_063<tab>……今は、ちょっと…………
聞き込み、頼む……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_064<tab>Don't you worry. Your friend will be safe with me. I know not what business you have here, but pray attend to it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_064<tab>お前さんら、何か用があって遥々来たみたいだな。
どれ、こいつの面倒は俺が看ておいてやるよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_000_070<tab>I've never seen anything like it─entire schools of fish suddenly washing up ashore. There were so many you couldn't see a single grain of sand! Our fishers have their hands full trying to clean up the mess even as we speak.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_000_070<tab>魚の事件かぁ……あれは、すごい光景だったよ。
打ち上げられた魚で、浜辺が埋め尽くされてね。
漁師たちが片付けてるらしいが、ありゃあ大変だろうよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_000_071<tab>Troublingly, we have no idea what caused it. It's not as if anything ominous occurred to portend such an event. Why, the night before was peaceful as always—the full moon shining bright in the night sky.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_000_071<tab>予兆と思えるような変わった出来事も、特になかったかな……。
あの日は、普段どおりのきれいな満月の夜だったのにね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_100_071<tab>I swear, these fish washed up seemingly out of nowhere. Where are we going to put them all?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTB04164_100_071<tab>魚たちが打ち上がる前に、
予兆と思えるような変わった出来事も、特になかったかな……。
あの日は、普段どおりのきれいな満月の夜だったのにね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_072<tab>Gah! You think <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> is a lot of fish? You should've been here earlier! This is a massive improvement, believe you me. No time to rest, though─if they start rotting, the stench alone will be enough to make the whole town ill!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_072<tab>魚が散らかってるなって？
ふぅ、これでもずいぶん片付けたんだぜ！
早く処分しねぇと腐っちまうし、商売上がったりだし散々だ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_073<tab>What's especially bizarre is that these fish normally stay away from land altogether─save for when they go up rivers to lay their eggs, that is.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_073<tab>そもそも、打ち上げられたアルネアンサーモンは、
産卵のため川を遡上するとき以外は、陸に寄り付かないんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_074<tab>Anyhow, I've never seen─or smelled─anything like it in my life, and I hope I never do again.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_000_074<tab>とにかく、こんなこと起きるのは初めてだよ。
そんで、二度とゴメンだね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_100_074<tab>This better not become a regular occurrence around here. I'm a fisher, damn it, not a rubbish collector!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_FISHER04164_100_074<tab>漁師ってのは、泳いでる魚を捕るもんだっての！
とにかく、こんなこと起きるのは初めてだよ。
そんで、二度とゴメンだね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_000_075<tab>Now that you mention it, there was one thing out of the ordinary earlier the day before the fish appeared. The river that runs here from the Shroud of the Samgha was swelling like mad.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_000_075<tab>魚が打ち上げられた日に、何があったか？
不可解なことと言えば、同じ頃に衆園の森から流れる川が、
増水して大変だったよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_000_076<tab>The seawater flowed back in to the river, and some say they saw it carrying fish deep, deep into the woods.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_000_076<tab>海から潮が逆流してきて、
森の奥まで魚を運んできたって噂もあるくらいでさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_100_076<tab>What could have caused the seawater to flow upstream? Whatever it was, I just hope it doesn't happen again. This stench isn't exactly good for business.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_MERCHANT04164_100_076<tab>海から潮が逆流してきて、
森の奥まで魚を運んできたって噂もあるくらいでさ。
増水ついでに、そんな妙なこと起こるもんかねぇ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_079<tab>We gave your friend some medicine, and thankfully, it seems to be working. He's finally feeling a little more like himself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_ALCHEMISTA04164_000_079<tab>この兄さん、いくらか良くなってきたみたいだな。
うちで用意した錬金薬も効いてるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_080<tab>My apologies for making you go alone, friend. I still can't quite stand up straight, but I feel much better than when I arrived.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_080<tab>ああ、話を聞いてまわってきてくれたんだな、ありがとう……。
まだ立ち歩くのはちょっと……っていう感じだけど、
この人が看ていてくれたおかげで、だいぶマシになったよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_081<tab>Tell me, were you able to learn anything of interest from the townspeople?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_081<tab>それで、何か関係のありそうなことはわかったか……？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_082<tab>A full moon the night before, and a strong tide flowing up into the river? It would seem this is what we call a tidal bore. The fact that these fish are typically not seen near the coast is strangely reminiscent of our whale problem, as well. No, this cannot be mere coincidence...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_082<tab>ふむ……魚が打ち上がったのは満月の夜で、
川を海水が逆流……海嘯が起きるほどの潮位だったってことか。
普段は沿岸で見ない魚っていうのも、クジラとの共通点になるな。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_083<tab>The matter of these fish that were supposedly carried upstream into the woods intrigues me as well. Assuming they're still alive, they would provide much more useful data than those rotting corpses on the beach.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_083<tab>海嘯に乗って密林のほうへ遡っていった魚っていうのが気になる。
何より、浜に打ち上げられて死んじまった個体よりは、
正確なデータが得られそうだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_084<tab>If we were to analyze them and find them in a similar aetheric state as the whale in Sharlayan, we could safely conclude that both events were caused by the same─or at least, a similar─phenomenon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_084<tab>それがシャーレアンに来たクジラと似た状態なら、
ふたつの現象が、同種の要因によるものという証拠になる。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_085<tab>I'm terribly sorry to impose upon you again, but could you go catch those fish for me? They might very well be the key to solving this mystery!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_085<tab>よし、それじゃあグリーナーとしてのお前に依頼だ。
クシールローダ川を遡っていったという、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>」を釣ってきてくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_085<tab>From the fisherman's description─swimming upstream, you said?─I suspect we are looking for Alnairan salmon. If so, those leeches you used on the clams in Garlemald should serve you well again here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_085<tab>釣り餌なら、外洋種から淡水種まで広い種の魚が好む、
「ウマビル」がここでも使えるんじゃないかな。
サベネア島までやってきた成果を出せたら嬉しいよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_086<tab>I loathe to impose, but you must go into the woods and catch those fish for me! I didn't come all this way just to get myself sick─I must solve this mystery!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_086<tab>クシールローダ川に向かい、釣り餌に「ウマビル」を使って、
「<var 28 ((Item)) F28C0901 /var>」を釣ってきてくれ！
今回の事件を解き明かす、糸口になるんじゃないかと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_091<tab>Oh, thank the gods! ...And thank you, my friend. I would have hated to go home with nothing but the memory of my worst bout of aether sickness ever.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_091<tab>おお、よかったぁ……！
張り切ってここまで来たからな、
お前のおかげで、ちゃんと成果が得られて嬉しいよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_092<tab>I'm happy to report that I also made some progress myself. I had a word with the alchemists who helped me, and it turns out they have a keen interest in aether as well. We had an exchange of views that was most stimulating.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_092<tab>俺の方でも収穫があったぞ！
介抱してくれた錬金術師たちと情報交換ができたんだ。
彼らはエーテル学についても、素晴らしい見識を持っててな。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_093<tab>I may not have been able to do much while here, but I'm glad I made the effort to leave the Studium for once.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_093<tab>ほとんど身動きがとれずではあったけど、
苦しい思いをしてまで、現地に来た甲斐があったよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_094<tab>Now, it's time we returned so I can make use of this new knowledge and analyze the sample you so kindly reeled in for me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_094<tab>そこから得た学びを活かすためにも、
まずは、はやいとこ帰ってサンプルの分析だな……！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_095<tab>Alas, while we may not need to use that gods-awful experimental aetheryte to travel back, an aetheryte is still an aetheryte. Heavens have mercy...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_095<tab>うぅぅ、帰りは新型を使わなくていいにせよ、
またエーテライトかぁ……！！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_100<tab>Good to see you return! Needless to say, the trip was a rough one for me. Thankfully, it wasn't nearly as uncomfortable as that dreadful experimental aetheryte.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_100<tab>ああ、お前も帰ったか！
帰路もやっぱりエーテル酔いはしたけど……
まぁ、新型を一度知ってしまえばね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_101<tab>I've just about finished analyzing the fish you caught in Thavnair. As expected, its aether levels are almost identical to those of the wayward whale.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_101<tab>ジャングルで見つかった魚の分析も、あらかた終わったよ。
件の魚と、クジラの生体エーテルの乱れを比較したところ、
案の定、ぴたりと一致したんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_102<tab>So you believe that a sudden change in the concentration of aether in the nearby currents caused them to completely alter their behavior?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_102<tab>北洋のクジラと、豊穣海の魚、
いずれも水脈のエーテル濃度の急変動によって、
近づかないはずの陸地に接近してしまった、と……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_103<tab>Precisely. That said, the change was of such magnitude that I would struggle to explain it with my initial hypothesis of aetheric tides.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_103<tab>しかし、この乱れは激し過ぎる……。
やっぱり、俺の「水脈潮汐説」では説明ができない現象だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_104<tab>On the contrary, if such sudden changes are possible, then I may have to reconsider my premise altogether. Moreover, we can't safely return the whale to the sea until we know precisely what is at the root of this problem.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_104<tab>こんな異常な急変動が起こったら、仮説が破綻しちまう。
保護されているクジラたちを安全に海に還すためにも、
どうにか要因を解明したいが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A2_000_001<tab>Might the tidal bore hold the answer?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A2_000_001<tab>満月の夜に海嘯が起きたと聞いた

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A2_000_002<tab>Is it not connected to the ebb and flow of the tide?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_A2_000_002<tab>潮の干満とは関係ないのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_106<tab>Yes, I do remember considering that when you shared the people's tales with me.
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_106<tab>なるほど……サベネア島の島民が、そんな話をしてたんだっけ。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_107<tab>If we posit that the underwater aether currents are affected by the moon─much as the tide itself is─then any sudden change in the moon's state would naturally affect underwater aether levels as well.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_107<tab>月の満ち欠けによって起こる潮の変化のような現象……
それが水脈にもあるならば、
月の異変の影響は、大いに受けるはずですよね。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_108<tab>Recent changes in the moon...?
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_108<tab>最近、月に起きた異変と言えば……

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_109<tab>By the Scholar, that's it! The destruction of Zodiark would have freed an unfathomable amount of aether from within the moon. It would be only logical if this had an impact on the underwater aether currents!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_109<tab>ゾディアークの消失か……！
月の内部に封じられていた巨大なエーテルが還ったんだ、
その影響が、水脈に影響を及ぼしたとしてもおかしくはない！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_110<tab>If this is the explanation, my initial theory may yet be viable─with this recent outpouring of aether being the exception that proves the rule. We will need to watch closely for any similar incidents in the near future...
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_110<tab>「水脈潮汐説」に例外が生じた理由にもなるが、
だとすれば、今回のようなケースが続発する可能性もあるな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_111<tab>Ah, T'laqa! Word has it that you braved the journey by aetheryte to do some fieldwork in Thavnair. Did you find aught of interest there?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_111<tab>君がエーテライトを使ってサベネア島まで行ったと聞きましてね。
驚かされましたが、さぞや大発見があったろうと……
しかし、この雰囲気は何事です？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_112<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_112<tab>ふむ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_113<tab>A word of advice, if I may. Any researcher worth his salt must be prepared to rethink and reevaluate their theories when presented with new evidence. Have you given any thought to how you might adapt yours?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_113<tab>チャ・ラカ……いたずらに不安を煽るのではなく、
君は研究者として、どのような新たな仮説を打ち立てるつもりです？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_114<tab>My initial theory was, to a degree, predicated on the existence of Zodiark. Now that He is no more, I am not entirely sure how we might─
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_114<tab>新たな仮説……ですか。
俺の「水脈潮汐説」は、ゾディアークの存在が前提だった。
それが消えた状況での水脈の変動を、予測するには……

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_115<tab>Unless we could... Yes, that's it! We could examine a species altogether more ancient—from a time when the heavens were free of Zodiark and other entities of high aetheric concentration!
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_115<tab>そうか！
ゾディアークのような高密度エーテル塊が、
天になかった時代の古生物のデータを調べれば！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_116<tab>Professor, please! This is no time for idle jests.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_116<tab>ちょっと、チャ・ラカさん！！
さすがにそこまで古い時代から現代まで、
生き残り続けている海洋生物なんて、見つかっていませんよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_117<tab>I'm being perfectly serious! Why, I have complete confidence that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here will be able to find what we require.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_117<tab>ええっ！
だって<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>なら、
見つけてきてくれそうじゃないか……！？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_118<tab>I do not doubt <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> skills, but even the best of gleaners would struggle to find specimens of species that doubtless died out ages ago.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_AUBRACIE_000_118<tab>いくら腕利きのグリーナーでも、無茶苦茶ですよ！
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに、
どれだけ世界中駆け回らせるつもりですか！？

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_117<tab>Oh, ye of little faith! Our friend is more than up to the task. Isn't that so, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_100_117<tab>そんなこと言うなよ、見つかるったら！
なぁ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_119<tab>Bahaha! Now that's the spirit, T'laqa. A good scholar must consider every possible option, even those that might seem impossible. Keep pondering the matter, and I have no doubt you will arrive at an answer ere long.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_NELE_000_119<tab>はははっ、その調子です！
多少の難題も、諦めず、考え続けなければ！

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>The next request will be available from T'laqa Tia upon reaching level 88 as a fisher.
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_120<tab>次の納品依頼は、
「漁師」がレベル88以上になると、
選者殿の「チャ・ラカ・ティア」から受注可能です。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>In order to undertake the subsequent quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “Thou Must Live, Die, and Know.”
target:
TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_SYSTEM_000_121<tab>次のクエストを進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：暁月のフィナーレ」の
「生まれ死んで答を得る」を完了する必要があります。

source: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_090<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKLA505_04164_TLAQATIA_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
